reviews.review_msg: Quite hard to obtain a good mark if you're a guy. Really likes to be in control(or appear so). She is very nice in person though, so going to see her during office hours is recommended.

Super nice and helpful teacher! The amount of work is fair and she is a very fair marker, not easy but you get what you deserve. Gives a lot of feed back! and lets you re-write certain assignments. Class is very interesting! also no textbook so you save money that way

Helen, is a very hard marker, her class is very writing intensive, however,you do not received credit for it, I did more writing in her class than in my W course. She responds quickly to emails if question arise, but is not very personable! Helen picks favourites in her class!
Easy A if you go to class. Don't need to do the readings just show up. The course material however, is extremely boring. There is nothing "new" about the theories discussed in lecture.

He's an easy marker but this course is a waste of time.  I was really interested in the subject but the "new" in "new information technology" should be taken out.  We study sociology theories from 10 years ago and it's mostly theory no application. No need to do readings, the full 4 hours is him regurgitating it in class.  Don't take this class!

Ken is a good guy.  He is very clear about everything and very eager to help.  He email replies are very detailed.  Word of caution, he gives a lot of reading.  He usually has one critical review and a major paper which is quite lengthy.  Overall fair marker.

Knows a lot about the topic.  Lectures 99.9% of the class and will not give you a chance to speak... EVER.  PRETTY MUCH WILL TALK YOU TO DEATH!  Class is not very structured, requirements for assignments are ambigious, some times seems unsure of himself and his marking schemes, and 20 page final paper is more than rediculous!

Very clear and easy prof. Don't even buy the textbooks you'll never need them.  No exams, just a couple papers, and a presentation. He was so laid back, and the class had a relaxed atmosphere. Definitely recommend this class.
